# [Interview #1152: Calamity-Seattle, Entry #15](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1152#15)

#### Question

Specifically in the Mistborn series, do you have a favorite emotional moment that you wrote?

#### Brandon Sanderson

I am and ending person, so I would say endings of various books, and endings of series in particular, are among my favorite. Iâ€™ll just leave it there.
